value.literal: Use A and D to move right and left.
Press Space or B to Jump.
Try to hold it longer...
Now, hold A or D while jumping.
You need to hold it until you release the space key!
You are ready to run away from here... Go right.
See the soliers? Try to attack them using J.
You don't needs more instructions !?? Fine, good luck.....
You have learned everything you need. Hurry up, they are coming for you... just go up, up and up...
Finally...
NO!!!
I need to catch up!
No one can control me!
No! Please! I don't want to...
It's been 10 years... Now I'm back.
I’m coming for you, Master Luke.
You are doomed…
Nice to see you... Again?
You must miss me so much, nice to see you again and again!
Hey, do you really want to escape??
... Why don't you just stay here?
Hey!!! I control your power carefully!!!
Fine, if you don't be careful... Hahaha....
OMG, is that XUAN????????
You have no chance to win XUAN anymore....
I'm glad to see you!
I'm glad to see you, AGAIN!
Come on, again? AGAIN!??
Don't you want to revenge?
I can't understand you, why you even being here?
Old man："Poor kid, to improve the status of your family, your father and I decide to send you to attend the experiments in our sect. For the rest of your life, you will need to practice all kinds
of internal skills and receive all kinds of stimulations. Don’t feel unfair. This is the brutality of the sects. Without sacrifice, there will be no strong sects."
A mysterious voice: "Bullshit! How can anyone believe this old bastard? Sending your apprentice to be a testimony and feel sorry for him? You are one of a kind!"
Song："Who are you? What’s that voice in my head? What’s going on with me?"
A mysterious voice:"You’re wondering who I am? My name is XUAN, and I can set you free."

comments.value: --The "player" should refer to the AI in this level.
--The latter "player" should be the AI in this level.
